title: Senior Business Intelligence Analyst, Ting
content:
Ting Internet is a leading fiber Internet provider in the United States, delivering future-proof internet in over a dozen Ting Towns across the country.
We are rapidly growing our footprint, and with a national focus on better infrastructure, we don’t expect to slow down anytime soon!
As part of Tucows (NASDAQ:TCX, TSX:TC), Ting is backed by outstanding resources and talent. We embrace a people-first philosophy that is rooted in respect, trust, and flexibility. We believe that whatever works for our employees is what works best for us. It’s also why the majority of our roles are remote-first, meaning you can work from anywhere you can connect to the internet!
The work we do genuinely changes lives. If this sounds exciting, we’d love to hear from you!
As the Sr. Business Intelligence Analyst, Operations you will:

Take a leading role measuring, understanding and improving the performance of Ting’s Operations, better known as the Networks org
Drive business operations improvement efforts to enable Ting to achieve it’s multi-year corporate goals and scaling ambitious
Work cross functionally with national/central and regional leaders to enhance operational excellence in areas such as construction, customer installation, engineering, and supply chain

Your responsibilities will include:

Building and maintaining business performance dashboards that enable sound decision making by executives and sr. leaders
Co-build and drive forward business improvement plan/initiatives
Contribute to OKR setting and tracking
Review financial reports and proactively drive desired P&L outcomes
Partnering with business leaders to strengthen existing scaling capabilities (playbooks, processes, systems)

Other:

Be a positive change agent for the operation
Track record of a growth mindset and grit
US and Canada travel up to 10%
All other duties assigned by your manager

Reports to:

Reports to Director, Networks Business Operations Excellence

Qualifications:

Experience converting data insights into business intelligence
Strong at visualization business performance trends to identify improvement opportunities, in tools like Power BI & Looker leverage data in Google Sheets & Snowflake respectively
Demonstrated ability to partner with operational stakeholders to build and deliver on business improvement plan/initiatives
Demonstrated knowledge of ISP operational practices and improvement strategies, ideally from the US Telecom
4+ years of business intelligence and/or manage management experience
Organizational change/scaling experience is highly desirable
Proven ability to create documentation and processes, and critical metrics
PMP/PMI certification is a plus

The base salary range for this position is $96,900 - $114,00 USD for US residents OR $85,085 - $100,100 CDN for Canadian residents. Other countries will differ. Range may vary on a number of factors including, but not limited to: location, experience and qualifications. Tucows believes in a total rewards offering that includes fair compensation and generous benefits. Learn more about Tucows Benefits.
Tucows and its subsidiaries participate in the E-verify program for all US employees. 
Want to know more about what we stand for? At Ting and Tucows we care about protecting the open Internet, narrowing digital divide, and supporting fairness and equality.
We also know that diversity drives innovation. We are committed to inclusion across race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status or disability status. We celebrate multiple approaches and diverse points of view.
We will ensure that individuals with disabilities are provided reasonable accommodation to participate in the job application or interview process, to perform essential job functions, and to receive other benefits and privileges of employment. Please contact us to request an accommodation.
What's new at Tucows
Learn more about Tucows, our businesses, culture and employee benefits on our site here.
#LI-JL1 #LI-remote

demographic_questions.description:
Optional Tucows Applicant Employment Equity Survey

Here at Tucows we are committed to hiring the right person for the job, always. As part of this, we want to ensure we’re receiving applications from people with all types of backgrounds.

This optional survey will not be connected to your application.

 Individuals seeking employment at Tucows are considered without regards to race, colour, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identification, national origin, age, marital status, ancestry, or disability status.

Filling out this optional survey simply helps Tucows determine how we as an organization are doing in attracting diverse talent.

Any information you provide will be kept confidential and will only be reported in aggregate form for Employment Equity purposes. In other words, the reported data will not contain any personal information.

Completion of the form is entirely voluntary. Whatever your decision, it will not be considered part of your application or at any time in the hiring process.
